animeTitle: My Nine Wives Told Me Not To Be Afraid
otherNames: Shi Niang Qing Zi Zhong, Jiǔ Wèi Shī Niáng Jiào Wǒ Bié Sǒng, My Nine Wives Told Me Not To Be Afraid, Nine Female Teachers Told Me Not to Be Scared, ¡Señoritas Por Favor Compórtense, 九位师娘叫我别怂, 师娘 请自重
synopsis: Chen Xuan, who was admitted to Dongling University, went to Jiangzhou Dongling to prepare for his studies. His first teacher, Lin Suyi, instructed him to find his fiancée and fulfill their engagement when he arrived in Dongling. Upon entering the city, Chen Xuan began to unlock various miraculous opportunities, encountering the spoiled and domineering young lady Jiang Wushuang, the ice-cold beauty Xiao Yuhan, and the gentle Ninth Mistress. At the same time, Chen Xuan began to have conflicts with various factions, gradually uncovering the deep-seated enmity and the grudge of extermination hidden within him. From then on, Jiangzhou trembled as Chen Xuan destroyed royal clans, confronted the Heavenly King's Palace, overthrew the heavens, and became unmatched in the world!
